Dating: CHRISTIAN PERIOD (not before); CHRISTIAN PERIOD; ISLAMIC PERIOD (not after)
Technique: ENGOBE; FORMED ON THE POTTER'S WHEEL
Name: Vase
Description: Slightly pointed jug with wide mouth, projecting rim and more or less stable flat bottom. The paste is of an orangey colour and the exterior surface is partly covered with a burnished reddish-coloured coating in the top half of the piece. In the bottom half the surface is burnt.
